metadata.title: CVE-2024-22386 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's drm/exynos device driverin exynos_drm_crtc_atomic_disable() function. This can result in a nullpointer dereference issue, possibly leading to a kernel panic or denial ofservice issue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-22386` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-31-generic - 6.8.0-31.31
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-generic - 6.8.0-31.31
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-generic-64k - 6.8.0-31.31
No subscription required

No subscription required
